Uses of Interface
eu.ciechanowiec.conditional.Runnable

    • Uses of Runnable in eu.ciechanowiec.conditional

      Methods in eu.ciechanowiec.conditional with parameters of type Runnable 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Conditional Conditional.onFalse​(Runnable actionOnFalse)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a false value.
      static void Conditional.onFalseExecute​(boolean conditionThatMustBeFalse, Runnable actionToExecute)
      Executes the submitted action if the passed boolean value is false.
      static <X extends Exception>
      void      		 Conditional.onFalseExecute​(boolean conditionThatMustBeFalse, Runnable actionToExecute, Class<X> expectedException)
      Executes the submitted action if the passed boolean value is false.
      Conditional Conditional.onTrue​(Runnable actionOnTrue)
      Submits an action to this conditional and bounds it to a true value.
      static void Conditional.onTrueExecute​(boolean conditionThatMustBeTrue, Runnable actionToExecute)
      Executes the submitted action if the passed boolean value is true.
      static <X extends Exception>

      Executes the submitted action if the passed boolean value is true.
